member.name: T:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples
member.summary: Provides C# code examples for creating, reading, and modifying Presentation images using the FileFormat.Slides library.

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Prepares the directory 'Presentations/Image' for storing or loading PowerPoint(PPT or PPTX) presentations at the root of the project. If the directory doesn't exist, it is created. If it already exists, existing files are deleted, and the directory is cleaned up. Prepares the directory 'Presentations/Existing/Images' to store images to be added to the presentations.

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples.AddImageInASlide(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method adds up an image in a slide

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples.UpdateImageInExistingSlide(System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: This method updates the existing image of a slide

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.ImageExamples.RemoveImageInExistingSlide(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method removes the image from presentation

member.name: T:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples
member.summary: Provides C# code examples for creating, reading, and modifying slides in a Presentation using the FileFormat.Slides library.

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Prepares the directory 'Presentations/New' for storing or loading PowerPoint(PPT or PPTX) presentations at the root of the project. If the directory doesn't exist, it is created. If it already exists, existing files are deleted, and the directory is cleaned up.

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples.CreateNewSlideInNewPresentation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method create slides in a new presentation

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples.CreateNewSlideInExistingPresentation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method creates new slide in an existing presentation

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.SlideExamples.RemoveSlideInAnExistingPresentation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method removes slide in an existing presentation

member.name: T:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.TextExamples
member.summary: Provides C# code examples for creating, reading, and modifying Text segments or shapes in a Presentation using the FileFormat.Slides library.

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.TextExamples.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Prepares the directory 'Presentations/New' for storing or loading PowerPoint(PPT or PPTX) presentations at the root of the project. If the directory doesn't exist, it is created. If it already exists, existing files are deleted, and the directory is cleaned up.

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.TextExamples.CreateNewTextShapeInNewSlide(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method adds text segment or shape in the silde of a new PowerPoint presentation.

member.summary: This method Sets the background color of a text shape

member.summary: This method sets the font family of a text shape

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.TextExamples.SetTextColorOfTextShape(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method sets the text color of text shape

member.name: M:FileFormat.Slides.Examples.TextExamples.SetFontSizeOfTextShape(System.String,System.String)
